body:

Illegal instruction (core dumped)

When running:
import tensorflow as tf. The same as i'm running my python script.

I'm using Ubuntu 16.04 LTS in Oracle Virtual Machine. My Laptop is Acer Aspire E 15 with Intel Celeron Processor N2840.
